data.description: One year ago, today, our #Orlando community witnessed evil and suffered extreme loss at the hand of a terrorist. Today, we remember the lives lost and those who will never be the same. However, we also reflect on the strength and resilience that is possible when people come together in love. Today, we ask that you join us in praying and remembering each life that was touched by the #Pulse tragedy. #orlandounited #orlandostrong
data.title: Timeline Photos
